Hymn.Arabic: إِبْلِنِي يَا رَبُّ وَجَرَبْنِي اِحْمِ قَلْبِي وَكُلْيَتَيَّ ،
Hymn.English: 2 Examine me, O Lord, and prove me; Try my mind and my heart.

Hymn.Arabic: لِأَنَّ رَحْمَتَكَ أَمَامَ عَيْنَيَّ هِيَ ، وَقَدْ أَرْضَيْتُكَ بِحَقِّكَ. هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 3 For Your lovingkindness is before my eyes, And I have walked in Your truth.     Alleluia
